text: Grimentz is a village and former municipality in the district of Sierre in the canton of Valais in Switzerland. On 1 January 2009, the former municipalities of Grimentz, Ayer, Chandolin, Saint-Jean, Saint-Luc and Vissoie merged into the new municipality of Anniviers. Category:Villages in Valais Category:Former municipalities of Valais
title: Grimentz
